mapper.sql: tthf_id, tthf_lbpm, djxh, tthf_yxqq, tthf_yxqz, tthf_xgr_dm, tthf_xgrq, tthf_sjgsdq, tthf_lrr_dm, tthf_lrrq, tthf_sjtbsj, tthf_fzjghfdlxdh, tthf_fzjghfddz, tthf_fzjghfdmc, tthf_fzjghfdnsrsbh, tthf_fzjghfddjxh, tthf_fzjgfduuid, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into t_tax_qyfzjg (tthf_id, tthf_lbpm, djxh, tthf_yxqq, tthf_yxqz, tthf_xgr_dm, tthf_xgrq, tthf_sjgsdq, tthf_lrr_dm, tthf_lrrq, tthf_sjtbsj, tthf_fzjghfdlxdh, tthf_fzjghfddz, tthf_fzjghfdmc, tthf_fzjghfdnsrsbh, tthf_fzjghfddjxh, tthf_fzjgfduuid, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime ) values (#{id}, #{tthfLbpm}, #{djxh}, #{tthfYxqq}, #{tthfYxqz}, #{tthfXgrDm}, #{tthfXgrq}, #{tthfSjgsdq}, #{tthfLrrDm}, #{tthfLrrq}, #{tthfSjtbsj}, #{tthfFzjghfdlxdh}, #{tthfFzjghfddz}, #{tthfFzjghfdmc}, #{tthfFzjghfdnsrsbh}, #{tthfFzjghfddjxh}, #{tthfFzjgfduuid}, #{creatorid}, #{createtime}, #{updatorid}, #{updatetime} )
mapper.update: update t_tax_qyfzjg set tthf_lbpm = #{tthfLbpm}, djxh = #{djxh}, tthf_yxqq = #{tthfYxqq}, tthf_yxqz = #{tthfYxqz}, tthf_xgr_dm = #{tthfXgrDm}, tthf_xgrq = #{tthfXgrq}, tthf_sjgsdq = #{tthfSjgsdq}, tthf_lrr_dm = #{tthfLrrDm}, tthf_lrrq = #{tthfLrrq}, tthf_sjtbsj = #{tthfSjtbsj}, tthf_fzjghfdlxdh = #{tthfFzjghfdlxdh}, tthf_fzjghfddz = #{tthfFzjghfddz}, tthf_fzjghfdmc = #{tthfFzjghfdmc}, tthf_fzjghfdnsrsbh = #{tthfFzjghfdnsrsbh}, tthf_fzjghfddjxh = #{tthfFzjghfddjxh}, tthf_fzjgfduuid = #{tthfFzjgfduuid}, creatorid = #{creatorid}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatorid = #{updatorid}, updatetime = now() where tthf_id = #{id}
